name: Spooky Singing Wall of Doom
description:
For BerlinMiniGameJame, May 2021

Absolutely underdeveloped. Maybe I'll update it later.

Hover your mouse over the colored bars and left click to play a note.

That's it. No way of stoping the notes so Alt+F4 is your friend lol.

Also, the only wall that works is the one that is missing the Blue bar.

The rest is decoration I guess (it wasn't supposed to be but no time

to implement the rest of the sounds :P)
